WstDispoEmssnFctrSetItm.name: WstDispoEmssnFctrSetItm
WstDispoEmssnFctrSetItm.description: Represents the individual emissions factors for scope 3 waste handling based on the waste type and disposal type.

EmissionsFactorValue.description: The emissions factor value to convert waste quantity into the corresponding emissions

EmissionsFactorValueUnit.description: The unit of measure for the emissions factor value.

EmssnFctrTco2eTonneWstMtrl.description: The emissions factor value in tCO2e per tonne of waste material. This value is calculated based on the emissions factor value and the emissions factor value unit.

ExternalIdentifier.description: The external identifier for the emissions factor.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, this record might only have been referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

ParentEmissionFactorId.description: The name of the parent emissions factor.

ReferenceDataLoadLogId.description: The reference data load log record that's associated with the emissions factor.

ShouldLockDtastUpdtForRec.description: Indicates whether the emissions factor record can be locked from dataset updates.
